channel.title: Pernix-Rsps V3 -Target System-Duo Slayer-100+ Players
channel.description:
[center]
[size=14pt]Pernix-Rsps was a server up about a month ago holding a playerbase from 50-90 players on at all times. We are now back and our game is reworked! So come join us now [/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1O2v0Pb.png[/img]
[img]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3f/House_icon.png[/img]Forums- [url=http://www.pernix-rsps.com/forum]Here[/url] [img]http://icons.iconarchive.com/icons/led24.de/led/16/joystick-icon.png[/img]Web Client- [url=http://www.pernix-rsps.com/home/webclient.php]Here[/url] [img]http://icons.iconarchive.com/icons/led24.de/led/16/joystick-icon.png[/img]Desktop Client- [url=http://www.pernix-rsps.com/PernixV3.jar]Here (Auto Download)[/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/WnU8Wb5.png[/img]
[Spoiler=For A LOT of media]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wCnYBVd.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oslTwvr.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6LMNJqr.png[/img]

[/spoiler]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/iSyYxLi.png[/img]
-Duo Slayer -Target system -Dwarf Multi-cannon -Bank Tabs -Switchable gameframes -Client settings -Money Pouch -Revenant cave -Killsteam system -Player user titles -Curses/quick prayers -Full summoning with working specials -All skills trainable with their own skilling zone -Stable economy -Pking is fun, and worth value -Trivia Bots -Perfect boss animations with multiple attack styles -Great shops to fulfill the needs of players -Working clue scrolls -Perfect bridding, welfare, pure, range, mage pking -Great pvm community -Unique barrows with interface -Very unique teleport interface offering many teleports -63 wave jad, log out between waves supported
------And of course many more, these are just the core features that make Illusionary unique!---------
[/center]

item.title: Pernix-Rsps V3 -Target System-Duo Slayer-100+ Players
item.dc:creator: @rigory rigory
item.description:
@rigory wrote:

[center]

[size=14pt]Pernix-Rsps was a server up about a month ago holding a playerbase from 50-90 players on at all times. We are now back and our game is reworked! So come join us now
[/size]

Forums- Here
Web Client- Here
Desktop Client- Here (Auto Download)

[Spoiler=For A LOT of media]

[/spoiler]

-Duo Slayer
-Target system
-Dwarf Multi-cannon
-Bank Tabs
-Switchable gameframes
-Client settings
-Money Pouch
-Revenant cave
-Killsteam system
-Player user titles
-Curses/quick prayers
-Full summoning with working specials
-All skills trainable with their own skilling zone
-Stable economy
-Pking is fun, and worth value
-Trivia Bots
-Perfect boss animations with multiple attack styles
-Great shops to fulfill the needs of players
-Working clue scrolls
-Perfect bridding, welfare, pure, range, mage pking
-Great pvm community
-Unique barrows with interface
-Very unique teleport interface offering many teleports
-63 wave jad, log out between waves supported

------And of course many more, these are just the core features that make Illusionary unique!---------

[/center]
